known_issues: Bottom navigation bar far-right profile icon is clipped/cut off on all screen sizes; user requests shifting all bottom nav icons slightly left to resolve.

existing_features.title: Fix the bottom navigation bar layout so the far-right Profile tab (icon + label) is no longer clipped/cut off on any screen size, including devices with right safe-area insets.
Shift all bottom navigation bar tabs slightly to the left (as a group) while keeping spacing visually balanced and consistent across screen sizes.
